entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Individual test failures may not always be surfaced as a failure in the test run summary. #90905
  • [API Proposal]: Add an interface to unify property/field access #90901
  • Add Option to Build Runtime Tests (src/tests/build.sh) Using Official Crossgen2 Bits #90900
    9.0.0
  • Performance regression, memory usage #90899
  • NegotiateAuthentication larger code size and also brings in BigInteger #90898
  • C# lock has a dead branch in codegen #90896
  • JIT-EE: Annotate APIs as Invariant/Non-invariant #90886
    Future
  • ComInterfaceGenerator should provide an info message when arrays don't have any [In] or [Out] attributes #90884
    8.0.0
  • Add docs for porting dotnet to a new OS/arch/libc #90883
    9.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator docs should be very clear about changed in marshalling behavior between built in COM #90876
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Functional.Tests timeout in CI #90874
    9.0.0
  • Crash/Unhandled exception with .net runtime upgrade. #90869
  • Should RegisteredWaitHandle always use Win32 TP? #90866

Closed

  • ContainsGenericParameters not reported for function pointer types #84916
    9.0.0
  • JIT test GenericCatchInterfaceProgram fails in Checked NativeAOT #90848
    9.0.0
  • Setting max worker threads of ThreadPool neither work nor fail #80072
    8.0.0
  • "Make member readonly" is offered even in cases where it changes behavior #90897
  • Port System.Runtime.InteropServices documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88573
    8.0.0
  • StringBuilder.AppendInterpolatedStringHandler breaks backwards compatibility and violates order-of-execution expectations #90885
  • Test failure Loader/classloader/generics/regressions/DD117522/Test/Test.sh #89545
    8.0.0
  • clr build is failing on machine with large number of cores #90879
  • FileSystemWatcher fails to trigger a file or Dir with a single char #46727
    Future
  • .net8.0.0-preview.7.23375.6, nativeaot, [Serializable] feature does not work #90860
  • [8.0] Unknown error (0xc0000001) from CngCommon.SignVerify in X509Certificates.Tests.PfxFormatTests_Collection.OneCert_TwoKeys_FirstWins #90877
    8.0.0
  • Ensure localization changes are ported to release/8.0 #90755
    8.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator Unmanaged to Manage call doesn't update the unmanaged pointer #90868
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.MemoryStream: ReadByte() and WriteByte() can throw IndexOutOfRangeException #88541
    Future
  • System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandlerFunctional.Tests.BidirectionStreamingTest.AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite failing #86262
    8.0.0
  • get attributes from objects created on runtime #90164
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Failing arm64 LLVM FullAOT tests #64179
    9.0.0
  • [Android][Test Failure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpMetricsTest_Http11_Async.AllSocketsHttpHandlerCounters_Success_Recorded #89237
    9.0.0
  • [browser] loadBootResource should not ask for `dotnetwasm` location before cache lookup #89883
    8.0.0
  • dotnet/cecil links to cecil.pe which is an unrelated website #90865

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Add a dependency on dotnet/installer to get the latest #90904
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix typo in documentation comments #90903
    area-System.Threading
  • Only initialize listeners once #90902
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Enable rule CA1869 - Cache and reuse 'JsonSerializerOptions' #90895
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Adding missing System.Buffers documentation #90891
    needs-area-label
  • [NativeAOT] Missing memory fence before bulk move of objects #90890
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add chrome versions to PR title, and labels #90889
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix SPMI issue in getHelperFtn #90888
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Upgrade wasm helix VMs to ubuntu 22.04 #90881
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Upgrade our TFM to net9.0 #90880
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Fix queue count in rate limiters #90878
    area-System.Threading
  • [mono][wip] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call JIT icall to handle static virtual methods #90875
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Update browser template to use Wasm SDK #90871
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add a test case for copy propagation #90870
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • [NativeAOT] Reverted the change in IsInstanceOfException #90867
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Type.ContainsGenericParameters for function pointers #90864
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix incomplete type errors when debugging in lldb/gdb (#90791) #90873
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Add missing space in yaml #90894
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add missing space in yaml #90893
    needs-area-label
  • Adding PACKAGE.md to System.Runtime.Caching package #90701
    area-System.Runtime.Caching
  • Fix Position and Seek for MemoryStream with custom origin #88572
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix queue count in rate limiters #90810
    area-System.Threading
  • [release/8.0] Change OneLocBuild mirror branch to release/8.0 #90813
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [main] Change OneLocBuild mirror branch to release/8.0 temporarily #90812
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #90819
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome version used for testing #90823
    arch-wasm
  • Update Package readme guidelines with new template #90842
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add Retry and Task.Delay to WinHttpHandler AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite test #90824
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0] Events for IL methods without IL headers #90844
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Initialize module's image ALC for dynamic objects #90731
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Update Fedora docker image to Fedora 38 #90776
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Notify jiterpreter when a method is freed #89980
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Enable Yield_r* tests with full-AOT (llvm) #90614
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some errors after the kernel supporting SIMD. #90734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64

Updated

  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • [NativeAOT] Made threadstatic helper call sites slightly simpler (static ctor case) #90641
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Bump main version to 9.0-alpha1 #90558
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Check for generic structs in "needs marshalling" check #90836
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Make DacValidateMD and DacValidateMethodTable more resilient #90794
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32 #89311
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Just running tests with new EH enabled on all platforms #90790
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix calling existing ctor with MethodInvoker; share tests with invokers #90796
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix dupe word typos. #88047
    area-Meta, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add tests for `GetInterfaceMap` on static interface methods #90518
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [Corrected] - Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #89405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Mono Interpreter - Mask AllShift amounts #90666
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Update (remove most) most of CLRTestKind, GenerateRunScript, RestorePackages #89696
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add New Test to Monitor Number of Jitted Methods #90681
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix tmpReg in emitInsTernary #90770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Expose an internal ISimdVector interface and being using it to deduplicate some SIMD code #90764
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [release/8.0] Fix config names for CallCountThreshold and CallCountingDelayMs #90841
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement AppendAllBytes API #90364
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Draft] Limit length of System.Runtime.BigInteger to int.MaxValue-32 bits #84901
    area-System.Numerics, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, Future
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Emit armv8.4 ldapur* for volatile loads with contained offsets #89681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix a deadlock in NonGC + Profiler API #90847
    area-VM-coreclr
